title: Targeted Pseudorandom Generators, Simulation Advice Generators, and Derandomizing Logspace
where-published-summary: SICOMP (special issue for STOC 2017, to appear)
timeline: A manuscript was first posted online in October 2016; the paper was presented at STOC in June 2017; the paper appeared online in the SICOMP special issue for STOC 2017 in March 2021 (ahead of print).
version-notes: The SICOMP version (pdf) has several minor improvements compared to the STOC proceedings version and the arXiv version, including fixing a minor error. The latter two versions are the same except for formatting.
copyright: (regarding the journal version) First Published in SIAM Journal of Computing in the STOC 2017 special issue, published by the Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM). Copyright Â© by SIAM. Unauthorized reproduction of this article is prohibited.
recognition: Oded Goldreich mentions the paper in this blog post.
